headline: Could Buying Ford Stock Today Set You Up for Life?
summary: In the past two decades, investors in Ford (NYSE: F) have seen their starting capital rise by just 55% (as of Nov. 25).  Clearly, Ford hasn't panned out as an effective wealth-building vehicle.  Ford has been around for more than 100 years.
